ygData.subject: Alliance Troops/Alliance Bridge
ygData.msgSnippet: (I d like to note, that when Zardus was gone, the main page was averaging 75 or so hits, and when he returned, it was at 20 or so. It s obvious he s a jinx!)

(I'd like to note, that when Zardus was gone, the main page was 
averaging 75 or so hits, and when he returned, it was at 20 or so.  
It's obvious he's a jinx!)



The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Punch/Unitron:





Nemesis Enforcer yelled as he recieved Zardus' transmission.  "SLAG!  
MY RULE HAS BEEN COMPROMISED!  Scattershot?"

"I don't take orders from you!"

"Slag.  I hate that idiot.  I hope Zardus die---gests his energon 
properly..." Nemesis said quickly as Zardus entered.  "I think you 
should commend me on the attack I organized against the Ark.  We 
crushed them.  I'm regrouping for a final assault to crush them all!"

Nemesis Enforcer burst out into evil laughter.

===

Dark One stopped, most of the others (my characters) stopping as he 
stopped, him in the lead.  "Zardus is back.  Did everyone recieve 
that comm. transmission of his?" he nodded as everyone confirmed 
(once more, everyone being my characters).  "To the base!" he said, 
heading for the Alliance base, followed by everyone (my chars.).
